title: Cassandra Use-Cases and V4 best features with Carlos Rolo | Ep. 113 Distributed Data Show
description:
It's always interesting to discuss technologies with real experts like Carlos Rolo, so we can't let him go without some questions answered. What are the most awaited version four features, who gets the biggest win from ZCS and why sidecar project is so important? All of these plus best and worst use-cases for Cassandra discussed in our new release of Distributed Data Show!

00:00 Introduction
00:36 Carlos & Cassandra: the first experience
02:39 Carlos' Talk at Accelerate Conference
03:46 Managed Services Team @ Pythian
04:40 Remote Work Culture
07:06 Cassandra v4: Virtual Tables
08:32 Cassandra v4: Sidecar Project
09:30 Cassandra v4: Zero Copy Streaming
12:10 Best use-cases for Cassandra
13:30 Worst use-cases for Cassandra
15:04 Typical Mistakes
17:35 Your Favourite Bug
